name: Nene Husband Funk
description:
Saw a youtube video with the nene husband funk remix. Got an idea that I wanted to try out. This is the result.

Original idea was to make something more akin to Space Channel 5 or Sayonara Wild Hearts, but I realized I have never made something that syncs gameplay with music , so I decided to go back to basics for this genre.

Tagged with "Beta" in the version, because I'm fully expecting the worst releasing this into the wild, performance issues, bugs, audio sync problems, you name it.

Feel free to let me know if encountering any problems, and I will try to address them.

Enjoy.
